## Flow

1. Setup sharing (hgfs)
2. Setup zsh (zsh.sh)
   1. Rust
   2. Golang
   3. NodeJS
   4. zplug
   5. Installs zsh if current shell is not zsh
   6. ReLogin required
3. Setup Xorg (x.sh)
   1. i3
   2. xinitrc
   3. Xresources
   4. Wallpaper
   5. tmux
   6. fonts
4. Tools (tools.sh)
   1. Alacritty
   2. Neovim
